title: Budget 2024: Govt to come out with document on energy transition pathway
description: Union Budget: This initiative aims to support pump storage projects that provide continuous energy. State-owned enterprises NTPC and BHEL will establish 800 MW supercritical thermal power plants to achieve higher efficiency.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
